name: clel3
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1
body: |- wb(wcel(c0, c1), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c0, cv(s0)))))

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wb(wcel(c0, c1), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c0, cv(s0))))), wcel(c1, universe))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, c1), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c0, cv(s0)))))
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c1, universe), wb(wcel(c0, c1), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c0, cv(s0))))))

cumulated.origin:

body.origin:

-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

comment: An alternate definition of class membership when the class is a set. (Contributed by NM, 18-Aug-1993.)
